checkbox-button-attrs.name: label
checkbox-button-attrs.desc: Value in the selected state (This parameter is valid only when checkbox-group or the bound object type is array.) The optional value of this attribute is medium-

checkbox-button-attrs.name: false-label
checkbox-button-attrs.desc: Value when no option is selected

checkbox-button-attrs.name: disabled
checkbox-button-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

checkbox-button-attrs.name: text
checkbox-button-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is Function.

checkbox-button-attrs.name: checked
checkbox-button-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.
